author: oheger
msg: Fixed a failing unit test. However, not sure if this is really the desired behavior.

author: kkolinko
msg: Add a page that illustrates EL Composite Expressions ("${a}${b}") to the Examples web application
This was designed as a reproducer for http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47413
Currently Composite ELs are correctly evaluated to Strings, but their coercion to the resulting type is broken.

author: lektran
msg: Changed behavior of the ant targets run-single-test and run-single-test-suite to be consistant with run-tests and fail the build if any of the tests fail
